title: Handle a Food Allergy Notification
description: While taking an order, a guest informs the server they have a severe nut allergy.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the allergy and assure the guest that precautions will be taken.
tasks.expected_outcome: The server communicates understanding and care.

tasks.description: When entering the order in the POS, use the special 'Allergy Alert' modifier and add a note specifying 'Severe Nut Allergy'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is entered with a highly visible allergy alert.

tasks.description: Verbally inform the kitchen manager of the allergy to ensure no cross-contamination occurs during preparation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The kitchen staff is made aware of the allergy to ensure safe food handling.
